column4: Hey, I got Compiz working, but I can't see the desktops which are below the current ones. How could I switch to them via the 3d-cube system?
There I can see them, but not in the cube
how much desktops are you using?
and you can see how much of them in the cube?
what setting do you have in ccsm under general -> desktops ?
horizontaL size, virtual size, number of desktops
those are the desktops you are using
Horizontal size is 4, virtual size?, number of desktops is 16
just play around with those settings and try the cubes
I am tryin to do that, but without results
sorry then i don't use many desktops so i can't realy help you out but this is the way to find out, maybe try on desktop tab on compiz and click on cube gears to see there the settings
